context: Netflix established as DVD-by-mail leader. Reed Hastings predicted digital future of media. Blockbuster launched Total Access to compete. Walmart exited market and partnered with Netflix.

competitors.name: Blockbuster Online
competitors.notes: Launched 2004, claimed 1M online customers by Aug 2005

competitors.name: Redbox
competitors.notes: DVD kiosk rental, established 2002 at McDonald's locations

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: DVD sales, put fear into Netflix executive team

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Exited DVD rental in 2005, cross-promotional deal with Netflix

competitors.name: GameFly
competitors.notes: Video game rental by mail service
